trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
The XmlDataSourceDesigner class is intended for use by the XmlDataSource control, and not intended for use by developers of custom XML data source controls.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.
The Configure method is called by the design host, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`.
Gets or sets a block of XML that the associated data source control binds to.
The Data property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
A string of XML data.
Gets or sets the file name of an XML file that the associated data source control binds to.
The DataFile property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
An XML file name.
Retrieves the design-time data source view object for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
The path to the view to retrieve.
The design-time data source view object for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
Initializes the designer and loads the specified component.
The component.

Used by a designer component to add properties to or remove properties from, the Properties grid in a design host at design time or to provide new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_IDictionary" name="IDictionary" href=""></xref> of properties.
Refreshes the schema from the data source, while optionally suppressing events.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress schema UI events; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source can be configured; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
The name of a view in the underlying data source.

A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> object containing information about the identified view, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a view with the specified name is not found.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
An array of names of the views in the data source.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
Specifies whether to suppress any events raised while refreshing the schema.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.

Gets or sets a block of Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data*> property or by the XML file that is indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile*> property.
The Transform property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
An XSL data string.

Gets or sets the file name of an Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) file (.xsl) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data*> property or by the XML file that is indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile*> property.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
The XSLT file name.

Gets or sets an XPath query to apply to the XML data that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data*> property or by the XML file that is indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile*> property.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
An XPath query.
